item.description:
The # 1 Real Estate Education and Networking Event of the Year!

Thousands have attended, networked and empowered their financial goals at this event over the past 8 years...

>> Click Here for Full details

If you are serious about using real estate to create both QUICK CASH and long-term financial security for you and your family, you must attend this powerful, Real Estate & Business Conference in Meriden, Connecticut on October 29 and 30, 2011.

==========
Guest Speakers
==========

Nyrik and Linda Huuskonen: How to Grow Your Portfolios - You Can Still Buy a House for the Price of a Car

Chris Johnson: How to Get Free Money to Start or Expand a Business, Get an Education, or Invest in Real Estate

Lee Phillips: Accumulation and Preservation of Wealth

Ed Rush: Discover the Marketing Power of the Internet for Your Local Business

Scott Meyers: Step by Step System to Building Wealth through Self Storage Investing

Robert Shemin: Ultimate Branding, Marketing, Sales Success Secrets (Session 1)

Robert Shemin: How To Profit from Real Estate in Today's Market (Session 2)

>> Click Here for Full details

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: 8th Annual New England Real Estate Investors Conference and Trade Show
